report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by Taxon Group site filter
report.description: Lists taxon groups and the number of species and occurrences within them. Optional date range and survey filters.
report.query: SELECT tg.title as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 ON ttl2.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id and ttl2.preferred='t' JOIN taxa t ON ttl2.taxon_id = t.id JOIN taxon_groups tg ON t.taxon_group_id = tg.id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN locations l on l.id=#location_id# AND st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, s.geom) WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY taxongroup UNION SELECT 'Total' as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 ON ttl2.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id and ttl2.preferred='t' JOIN taxa t ON ttl2.taxon_id = t.id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN locations l on l.id=#location_id# AND st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, s.geom) WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND '#include_total#'<>'no'

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for

param.name: location_id
param.description: Select the site to return data for.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
